name: Hongxia Yang
content: Hongxia Yang Professor Department of Computing Hong Kong Polytechnic University Prof. Hongxia Yang, PhD from Duke University, has published over 150 papers in top-tier conferences and journals, and holds more than 50 patents in the USA and China. Previously, she worked as a research staff member at IBM T.J. Watson research center, principal scientist at Yahoo!, an AI scientist and Director at Alibaba DAMO Academy, an adjunct professor at Zhejiang Universityâ€™s Shanghai Advanced Research Institute and the Head of Large Language Models at ByteDance US. Open positions: I am currently seeking to recruit fully funded Research Assistants, PhD students, Postdoctoral Fellows, and Research Assistant Professors (RAP) with expertise in Generative AI (LLMs, MLLMs, Diffusion Models), Reinforcement learning (RL) and decentralized computing. For further details on our recent progress, please refer to our huggingface workspace. We maintain high standards in coding. Please be prepared to complete a coding test first, followed by a presentation summarizing your previous work as the second round of the interview. Once you are ready, please send me an email with your CV.
